name: 360Fashion Network
tag_list: fcommerce, mcommerce, ecommerce, social-shopping, mobile, china, renren, weibo, sina-weibo, tencent-weibo, fashion, shopping, women, mobile-apps, meego, symbian, iphone, ipad
overview:
A fashion focused tech company with mobile & social tools to promote brands, together with a high-level blogger network.

Our mobile news applications include: Blackberry (voted top fashion app by the Guardian UK), Samsung, Android, Nokia Symbian, Nokia Meego, and Sony Ericsson.

Our mobile Look-Book applications are in iPhone (http://getap.ps/360fashion) and Nokia Meego, with fashion runway collections. Our iPhone application has a desktop magazine editing tool to create rich layouts, with hotlinks, text, photos for fashion brands. The Nokia Meego app has live news, look-books, and when clicking over to the social tab, searches Sina Weibo and Twitter for the conversations happening in real time around the news/look-book from the designers. The app is created to drive buzz in China around brands.

We have a mobile application platform (MobileMags) for brands to create a viral mobile catalog, event invitation, look-book, or product flyer that works in almost every mobile phone (http://bit.ly/mobilemags) with the ability to sms it to anyone in your phone contact list (http://mobilemags.360fashion.net).

Our social e-commerce solution which is a 3 in 1 solution: Fcommerce, Mcommerce, Ecommerce for fashion brands. It connects to Chinese social media networks, and is in Chinese and English. This product is perfect for medium to small brands looking to connect with Chinese social media and customers, along with harnessing the power of facebook fans, and it works seamlessly together with our MobileMags solution.

Our fashion blogger network consists of top fashion professionals in every corner of the globe who are writing from inside the fashion industry and are experts in their field.
